title: Sunrise Mall Complex
description: A multi-brand shopping complex featuring 80+ retail outlets and a food court.

title: Corporate Tech Park
description: A 12-floor office tower with modern amenities and LEED certification.

title: Metro Business Center
description: A business park designed for startups and SMEs with co-working spaces.

description: A commercial skyscraper with retail, office, and restaurant spaces.

title: Industrial Shed Project
description: A heavy-duty industrial unit for manufacturing and logistics.

title: Modern Villa Estate
description: A luxurious 4BHK villa community with gardens and private pools.

description: Wooden vacation cottages with scenic valley views and fireplaces.

description: A modern duplex community with parking, parks, and clubhouses.

title: Green Living Apartments
description: Eco-friendly flats with solar panels, recycling units, and playgrounds.

title: Riverside Residency
description: Waterfront apartments with 24x7 security and recreation zones.
